description:
Create a dev-only web UI that visualizes agent execution graphs, allows setting breakpoints in agent loops, inspecting memory state, and manually triggering specific agents with custom inputs. Integrate with existing WebSocket streaming.

**Rationale:** Multi-agent workflows like Solve and Research have complex state transitions that are hard to trace through logs alone. A visual debugger would dramatically reduce time spent diagnosing agent behavior issues and memory corruption.
title: Interactive Agent Debugger with Step-Through UI
